thread.title: Ball State gives Buffalo Bill's Wild West a virtual makeover (Ball State University)
thread.title_full: Ball State gives Buffalo Bill's Wild West a virtual makeover (Ball State University) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Ball State gives Buffalo Bill's Wild West a virtual makeover (Ball State University)
text: ( Source : Ball State University ) October 12 , 2015 Digital artists from Ball State 's IDIA Lab built their virtual simulation of Buffalo Bill's Wild West with the Unity 3-D gaming platform along with custom software created by the lab. Cowboys
